title: Simple and Intuitive Setup for Easy Use
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want a simple installation and configuration process for ALFRED so that I can easily set it up without feeling overwhelmed or confused.

title: Privacy and Security Measures for Personal Data
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to ensure that my personal and health information is securely stored and only accessible to me and my caregivers, so that I can maintain my privacy while using ALFRED.

title: User-Friendly Accessibility Features for Enhanced Independence
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to have user-friendly accessibility features so that I can navigate the system easily and maintain my independence without feeling overwhelmed.

title: Dynamic User Interface Tailored to Cognitive Abilities
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want the interface of ALFRED to adapt to my cognitive abilities so that I can navigate it easily and feel empowered without feeling monitored.

title: Seamless Device Integration for Enhanced Support
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to easily connect with my personal devices so that I can manage my health, appointments, and activities without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.

title: Cognitive Stimulation Games
summary: As an active retiree, I want to engage in cognitive stimulation games so that I can maintain my mental sharpness while enjoying a fun and easy-to-use interface.

title: User-Friendly Onboarding for Empowering Technology Use
summary: As an active retiree, I want a simple onboarding process so that I can easily set up and start using ALFRED without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.
